amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 112-173 to prohibit use of funds by the Chief Administrative Officer to make any payments from any MRA for the leasing of a vehicle in an amount that exceeds $1,000 in any month.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hanna amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Hanna.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hanna amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
